price: 17. (Y) dijo:«¡Señor!, por la gracia que me has concedido, no volveré a ayudar a ningún pecador incrédulo (que desobedece Tus mandatos).
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ بِمَآ أَنۡعَمۡتَ عَلَيَّ فَلَنۡ أَكُونَ ظَهِيرٗا لِّلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi bimā anʿamta ʿalayya falan akūna ẓahīran lil'muj'rimīna
